barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to emigrants from Europe, December —, 1831. Description of Texas— geography, climate, productions, government—and advantages which it offers to European immigrants. (Omitted. See title in text. Published in Southwestern Historical Quarterly, October, 1924.)
